events.message: The customer has reported an auto accident involving their vehicle hitting a pole at the intersection downtown.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and accident description.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle the customer's case promptly.
The customer was contacted and the claim acknowledgment was confirmed to ensure they are aware their case is being processed.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report to proceed with further investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including photos and a detailed incident report from the police.
Investigation team started reviewing all submitted evidence and statements related to the vehicle collision.
The investigation concluded no fault was found with the insured driver and repairs are covered under the policy.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover all damages and repair costs to the customerâ€™s vehicle.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the thorough investigation and the proposed settlement offer.
Claim approval was finalized, authorizing payment for vehicle repairs according to the agreed terms.
Payment was issued promptly to the designated repair shop to cover the full cost of vehicle repairs.
The claim was officially closed after repairs were confirmed completed and the customer was fully reimbursed.
